SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_GETGENDER
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Gets the gender for a given constituent
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_GETGENDER(@CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier) returns tinyint with execute as caller as begin DECLARE @GENDERCODE tinyint;
SELECT @GENDERCODE = GENDERCODE FROM dbo.CONSTITUENT WHERE ID = @CONSTITUENTID
IF @GENDERCODE IS NULL SET @GENDERCODE = 0
return @GENDERCODE; end
